issue.title: [Rust] JSON reader does not implement iterator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11823](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11823). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://docs.rs/arrow/3.0.0/arrow/json/reader/struct.Reader.html does not implement the iterator trait even though it implements next.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11823?focusedCommentId=17332224) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/193
